text:
[Verse]
Neon lights they glow so bright
City feels alive at night
Dancing shadows passing by
Hustle bustle never shy

[Verse 2]
Skyline shining in the dark
Every street a glowing spark
People chatting on their phones
This city's got its own tone

[Chorus]
City lights they guide the way
In the night they come to play
Every corner something new
City's dreams they all come true

[Verse 3]
Traffic sounds a steady beat
Concrete jungle no defeat
Buildings tall they pierce the sky
Never-ending human tide

[Bridge]
Moon above so clear and full
Drawn into the city's pull
Wander 'round til break of dawn
In this city
Never gone

[Verse 4]
See the faces all around
Each one has a life profound
Stories told through every light
In the city oh so bright
title: City Lights
